name: 3r-boilerplate
description: modern, universal and simple web application boilerplate built using cutting-edge technologies

scripts.build:server-dev: rimraf src/~build-server src/content/bundle.css src/content/bundle.css.map src/server.js src/server.js.map && cross-env APP_TARGET=server NODE_ENV=development node scripts/build-server && ncp src/~build-server/server.js src/server.js && ncp src/~build-server/server.js.map src/server.js.map && ncp src/~build-server/bundle.css src/content/bundle.css && ncp src/~build-server/bundle.css.map src/content/bundle.css.map && rimraf src/~build-server
scripts.build:server-prod: rimraf src/~build-server && cross-env APP_TARGET=server NODE_ENV=production node scripts/build-server
scripts.build:client-prod: rimraf src/~build-client && cross-env APP_TARGET=client NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js --progress
scripts.build:prod: rimraf src/build && npm run build:server-prod && npm run build:client-prod && mkdir src/build && ncp src/~build-server/server.js src/build/server.js && ncp src/~build-server/server.js.map src/build/server.js.map && ncp src/~build-client/ src/build && rimraf src/~build-server && rimraf src/~build-client
scripts.dev: npm run lint && npm run build:server-dev && cross-env APP_TARGET=server NODE_ENV=development node src/server.js
scripts.prod: npm run lint && npm run build:prod && cd src/build && cross-env APP_TARGET=server NODE_ENV=production node server.js

author: Eugene Baranchuk <vencedor@gmail.com> (http://github.com/mezzario)
